DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine safety immunogenicity Live Francisella tularensis Vaccine
DOC.brief_title: Continued Safety Immunogenicity Study Live Francisella Tularensis Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objectives : 1 . To assess safety live F. tularensis vaccine NDBR 101 . 2 . To assess immunogenicity live F. tularensis vaccine NDBR 101 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 18 year old . 2 . Females childbearing potential must agree urine serum pregnancy test vaccination day , immediately vaccination ( Exception : documented hysterectomy > 3 year menopause ) . The result must negative . Subjects must agree become pregnant 3 month receipt vaccine . 3 . Subjects must risk exposure F. tularensis . 4 . Subjects must uptodate ( within 1 year ) medical history include concomitant medication , physical examination , laboratory test chart medically clear participation investigator . 5 . Subject must willing return followup visit day 1 2 , day 59 , 1216 , 2835 , 5684 ( need ) , visit serology , closeout interview 6 month ( Â±14 day ) vaccination revaccination . 6 . Subject must agree report adverse event may may associate administration test article least 28 day vaccination . 1 . Over age 65 Years . 2 . Vaccinated tularemia within last 10 year document , confirm tularemia infection . 3 . Clinically significant abnormal lab result include evidence hepatitis C , hepatitis B carrier state , elevate liver function test ( two time normal range discretion PI ) . 4 . Personal history immunodeficiency current treatment oral intravenous immunosuppressive medication . 5 . Confirmed HIV* infection . 6 . A medical condition , judgment Principal Investigator ( PI ) , would impact subject safety . 7 . Antibiotic therapy within 7 day vaccination . 8 . Pregnancy lactation . Subjects must agree become pregnant 3 month receipt vaccine . 9 . Any known allergy component vaccine : Modified casein partial hydrolysate medium Glucose cysteine hemin agar Sucrose gelatin agar stabilizer 10 . Administration another vaccine within 4 week tularemia vaccination . 11 . Any unresolved AE result previous immunization .
